about.aboutContent:
Created for you to visualize our planet and understand how the Earth has changed over time, Esri's Earth Observation Explorer provides the power of Sentinel-2 and Landsat satellites, which gather data beyond what the eye can see. Use this app to draw on the different bands of Sentinel-2 and Landsat to better explore the planet's geology, vegetation, agriculture, and cities. Additionally, access the Sentinel-2 and Landsat archives to visualize how the Earth's surface has changed over time.

For information on Esri's full imagery capabilities, visit http://www.esri.com/imagery.

To build your own web app like Earth Observation Explorer, visit http://developers.arcgis.com.

For more info about this app, or setting up an app like this in your own infrastructure, contact Esri http://www.esri.com.
